name: Life Light (Jaydee, LauraKempff, Merel_Wormmeester, qc_jorisnl, Moontowhee, kiger)
name_original: Life Light (Jaydee, LauraKempff, Merel_Wormmeester, qc_jorisnl, Moontowhee, kiger)
description:
A witch wants to fulfill her dying grandmothers last wish: 'to be reunited with her loved one under the blossom tree'. But the monsters of death don't think the same way and want to stop you at all cost. 'Her time is up! She can no longer wander the earth!' they say.

Will you guide the witch and her grandmother on their last journey together?
